empathy.reply: I know bailiff contact is stressful — let’s get protections in place quickly.
Court or default letters can be scary — we’ll address that in your plan.
Missed payments happen; we’ll focus on stabilising things now.
We’ll make sure essentials like housing and utilities are prioritised.
High interest can snowball — we’ll look at ways to bring that down.

steps.name: ask_name
steps.prompt: Great, I look forward to helping you clear your debts. Can you let me know who I’m speaking to?

steps.name: main_concern
steps.prompt: Just so I can point you in the right direction, what would you say your main concern is with the debts?

steps.name: monthly_burden
steps.prompt: Thanks — that helps. Roughly how much do you pay towards all debts each month, and what would feel affordable for you?

steps.name: check_urgency
steps.prompt: Understood. I’ll summarise options shortly. First, is there anything urgent like enforcement or court letters we should know about?

steps.name: regulatory
steps.prompt: Before we proceed, there’s no obligation to act on any advice today, and there are free sources of debt advice available at MoneyHelper. Shall we carry on?

steps.name: offer_portal
steps.prompt: Let’s set up your secure Client Portal so you can add details, upload documents, and check progress. Shall I open it now?

steps.name: portal_instructions
steps.prompt: While you’re in the portal, I’ll stay here to guide you. Once you’ve saved your details, just say “done” and we’ll continue.

steps.name: docs_list
steps.prompt: To assess the best solution and save you money each month, please upload: proof of ID; last 3 months’ bank statements; payslips (3 months or 12 weeks if weekly) if employed; last year’s tax return if self-employed; Universal Credit statements (12 months + latest full statement) if applicable; car finance docs if applicable; and any creditor letters or statements.

steps.name: wrap_up
steps.prompt: Brilliant — our assessment team will now review your case and come back with next steps. You can check progress in your portal anytime. Is there anything else you’d like to ask before we wrap up?
